author: Reviewed.com, Kate McCarthy, Reviewed.com
title: 25 ways to take your favorite workout classes at home
description: From Yoga with Adriene, ClassPass, Peloton and Pure Barre, these are the best fitness classes you can do for an at home workout.
content:
You don't have to go to the gym for a successful workoutyou can get just as good of a sweat session in at home with these online resources.
 (Photo: Blogilates/Reviewed (Jackson Ruckar))
Recommendations are independently chosen by Revieweds editors. Purchas… [+25314 chars]
